about_the_game:
Your battleground is arena, your enemies are robots, your energy is hard-hitting music and you are RAGER! Immerse yourself in the adrenaline-fueled excitement of this melee combat rhythm game!

Master weapon of your choice – sword, mace, claws, hammer, axe, your own fists and many more! Pick anything from tremendous arsenal and unleash the chaos! Time your attacks, blocks, and dodges to the rhythm of the music and cause maximum impact.

Don't let robots to swarm you from all directions, test your skills and reflexes. The immersive audiovisual experience will keep you on your toes, stunning visuals and spatial audio technology puts you right in heart of the action.

In RAGER, you're not just a player – you're a force to be reckoned with. So gear up, warrior, and prepare to show the world what you're made of in the ultimate battle for survival!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR on SteamVR with Index, Meta Quest 2 and Meta Quest 3, requires motion controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR on SteamVR with Index, Meta Quest 2 and Meta Quest 3, requires motion controllers
